verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_7: The punishment of your Lord is coming.
verse.verse_8: There is nothing to avert it.
verse.verse_9: On the Day when the heaven sways in agitation.
verse.verse_10: And the mountains go into motion.
verse.verse_11: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verse.verse_13: The Day when they are shoved into the Fire of Hell forcefully.
verse.verse_14: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.
verse.verse_15: Is this magic, or do you not see?
verse.verse_16: Burn in it. Whether you are patient, or impatient, it is the same for you. You are only being repaid for what you used to do."
verse.verse_17: But the righteous will be amid gardens and bliss.
verse.verse_18: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord has spared them the suffering of Hell.
verse.verse_19: Eat and drink happily, for what you used to do.
verse.verse_20: Relaxing on luxurious furnishings; and We will couple them with gorgeous spouses.
verse.verse_21: Those who believed and their offspring followed them in faith-We will unite them with their offspring, and We will not deprive them of any of their works. Every person is hostage to what he has earned.
verse.verse_22: And We will supply them with fruit, and meat; such as they desire.
verse.verse_23: They will exchange therein a cup; wherein is neither harm, nor sin.
verse.verse_24: Serving them will be youths like hidden pearls.
verse.verse_25: And they will approach one another, inquiring.
verse.verse_26: They will say, "Before this, we were fearful for our families.
verse.verse_27: But God blessed us, and spared us the agony of the Fiery Winds.
verse.verse_28: Before this, we used to pray to Him. He is the Good, the Compassionate."
verse.verse_29: So remind. By the grace of your Lord, you are neither a soothsayer, nor a madman.
verse.verse_30: Or do they say, "A poet-we await for him a calamity of time"?
verse.verse_31: Say, "Go on waiting; I will be waiting with you."
verse.verse_32: Or is it that their dreams compel them to this? Or are they aggressive people?
verse.verse_33: Or do they say, "He made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
verse.verse_34: So let them produce a discourse like it, if they are truthful.
verse.verse_35: Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?
verse.verse_36: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they are not certain.
verse.verse_37: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord? Or are they the controllers?
verse.verse_38: Or do they have a stairway by means of which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear proof.
verse.verse_39: Or for Him the daughters, and for you the sons?
verse.verse_40: Or do you demand a payment from them, and they are burdened by debt?
verse.verse_41: Or do they know the future, and they are writing it down?
verse.verse_42: Or are they planning a conspiracy? The conspiracy will befall the disbelievers.
verse.verse_43: Or do they have a god besides God? God transcends what they associate.
verse.verse_44: Even if they were to see lumps of the sky falling down, they would say, "A mass of clouds."
verse.verse_45: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be stunned.
verse.verse_46: The Day when their ploys will avail them nothing; and they will not be helped.
verse.verse_47: For those who do wrong, there is a punishment besides that; but most of them do not know.
verse.verse_48: So patiently await the decision of your Lord, for you are before Our Eyes; and proclaim the praises of your Lord when you arise.
verse.verse_49: And glorify Him during the night, and at the receding of the stars.
